description: {"blocks":[{"key":"d2run","text":"The protocol summarises the procedures used for analytical control. The protocol describes the Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) for the optimization of advanced tertiary treatment of water, based on a comprehensive quality and risk assessment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

keywords: water sampling, water processing, water analysis, waste water treatment, advanced tertiary treatment SOP

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"94eme","text":"The water production for AWARE main activities includes three stages – disinfection by ultraviolet C radiation (UVC), storage for - (according to water load and season) and ozonation. The water quality is monitored at these three stages, for the parameters indicated in Figure 1 below.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":129,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":131,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"en79q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fl4pj","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7o37","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":43200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":0,"preset":[],"start":0}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":86400,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"height":288.9454545454546,"id":466692,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":null,\"entityMap\":null}","mime":"image/png","originalFile":{},"original_name":"1-.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qh2gcd64x.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qh2ecd64x.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qh2fcd64x.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qh2dcd64x.webp","width":580}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3fklb","text":"Sampling, Processing, and Analyses ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6umoc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2h0lc","text":"Water samples are collected (see Figure 2) and processed within a interval, before being shipped for the partner responsible for the analyses (Table 1). In case no processing is needed, samples are frozen and stored at within .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":65,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":218,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":225,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"256ci","text":"\nFor each sampling event, the date, day of the week and hour; the temperature and rain. Sampling points, indicated in Figure 2 were designated from A to I:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8hcqp","text":"- Influent of primary treatment (A) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6iv2r","text":"- Influent of biological treatment (activated sludge) (B) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7tg71","text":"- Treated secondary effluent (C) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9lic","text":"- Sand filter effluent (D) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4clbf","text":"- UVC effluent (E) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c7aub","text":"- Storage for reuse tank effluent (F) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fhda6","text":"- Ozonation effluent (1 dose, e.g., O3) - MITO3X technology - (G) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":35,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8n5o3","text":"- Effluent of the vacuum UV oxidation (VUV) (H) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b0ab5","text":"- Effluent of reactive storage / Influent of the recirculation aquaculture system (RAS) (I) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"af5q3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d4ooi","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cr1id","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":21600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":10800,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":5}},"4":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"height":319.5272727272727,"id":466696,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":null,\"entityMap\":null}","mime":"image/png","originalFile":{},"original_name":"2--.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qh2kcd64x.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qh2icd64x.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qh2jcd64x.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qh2hcd64x.webp","width":580}}}}

steps.section: Methods: The section below summarises the procedures used for analytical control – detailed protocols are annexed to this protocol.
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7jpv8","text":"Metals: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":7},{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ccp91","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"400ke","text":"Analysis: Detection and quantification of metals ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fvon7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fh7gn","text":"Method: Acidified water samples were analyzed for several metals (e.g. Al, Cu, Ni, Co, Pb, Zn, Cd, Pt, Sb, Sn, U, As, Ag, Hg, REEs) by means of ICP-MS (7900 Agilent) using matrix-matched external calibration. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"35ibv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8gjls","text":"Observations: Samples were filtered/centrifuged within after collection, and then acidified to 0.15M HNO3.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":54,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2rg7f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":43200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

steps.section: Parameters framed by Legal and Regulatory Requirements:
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3hrq5","text":"Using the EU Drinking Water Directive:  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5o0r5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bdbrj","text":"Metals - DIRECTIVE 2008/105/EC OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 16 December 2008 on environmental quality standards in the field of water policy ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: WATER PRODUCTION FOR AWARE (Metals)
